episodes.title: Cult of Personalities with Special Guest Joel
episodes.description: In this episode of "Life, Love, and Other Mysteries," hosts Sharla and Tiffany, along with special guest expert Joel, delve into the topic of cults and their influence on society. They share personal experiences and discuss notorious examples like the OJ Simpson case, Jonestown, and the Manson family. Sharla and Tiffany also explore the contemporary cult "Love Has Won," expressing astonishment at the manipulation and control exerted over its members. Special guest Joel contributes by defining cults and recounting his family's involvement with the Institute in Basic Life Principles (IBLP). The episode emphasizes the importance of discernment and critical thinking when it comes to cults and their charismatic leaders.
